doc:
Wyatt Emory Cooper https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wyatt_Emory_Cooper 0 Wyatt Emory Cooper (September 1, 1927 – January 5, 1978) was an American author, screenwriter, and actor, known for being the fourth husband of Vanderbilt heiress and socialite Gloria Vanderbilt and the father of CNN anchor Anderson Cooper. As an actor, he was usually billed as Wyatt Cooper. Wyatt_Emory_Cooper ( September_1_,_1927 – January_5_,_1978 ) was an_American_author , screenwriter , and actor , known for being the_fourth_husband of Vanderbilt_heiress_and_socialite_Gloria_Vanderbilt and the_father of CNN_anchor_Anderson_Cooper . As an_actor , he was_usually_billed as Wyatt_Cooper .
